com.redhat.rhn.manager.kickstart.cobbler

Class CobblerDistroHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.kickstart.cobbler.CobblerDistroHelper

  • public class CobblerDistroHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton helper with methods for creating/updating cobbler Distro from KickstartableTree.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.cobbler.Distro createDistroFromTree(org.cobbler.CobblerConnection cobblerConnection, KickstartableTree tree)
      Create a new (non-XEN) cobbler Distro from the given tree.
      org.cobbler.Distro createXenDistroFromTree(org.cobbler.CobblerConnection cobblerConnection, KickstartableTree tree)
      Create a new XEN cobbler Distro from the given tree.
      static CobblerDistroHelper getInstance()
      Returns an instance of this this class (singleton).
      void updateDistroFromTree(org.cobbler.Distro distro, KickstartableTree tree)
      Update the existing (non-XEN) cobbler Distro using data from the given tree.
      void updateXenDistroFromTree(org.cobbler.Distro distro, KickstartableTree tree)
      Update the existing XEN cobbler Distro using data from the given tree.

      • createDistroFromTree

        public org.cobbler.Distro createDistroFromTree(org.cobbler.CobblerConnection cobblerConnection,
                                               KickstartableTree tree)
        Create a new (non-XEN) cobbler Distro from the given tree. Update this tree with the ID of the new Distro.
        Parameters:
        cobblerConnection - connection to use to communicate with Cobbler
        tree - tree containing information for creating the new Distro
        Returns:
        newly created Distro instance

      • createXenDistroFromTree

                                                  KickstartableTree tree)
        Create a new XEN cobbler Distro from the given tree. Update this tree with the ID of the new Distro.
        Parameters:
        cobblerConnection - connection to use to communicate with Cobbler
        tree - tree containing information for creating the new Distro
        Returns:
        newly created Distro instance

      • updateDistroFromTree

        public void updateDistroFromTree(org.cobbler.Distro distro,
                                 KickstartableTree tree)
        Update the existing (non-XEN) cobbler Distro using data from the given tree.
        Parameters:
        distro - Distro instance to be updated
        tree - tree containing information for updating the new Distro
